about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for 1000xRESIST, featuring 85 tracks of original music by Line Katcho, Drew Redman, and guest songwriter Alex Mah.

A note from the developers:

1000xRESIST has a lot of music – and we really needed it, to help differentiate all the various time periods the player traverses. We feel so lucky to have been able to work with Line and Drew, who poured their heart and soul into scoring the game, while each retaining their own unique compositional voices. Their music directly affected the writing of the game, as we’d listen to them on loop as we worked, and would often play the tracks over headphones to the voice actors as they recorded in the booth.

I hope you find a favourite track and click that repeat button!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Cursing and Crude Language, Generational Trauma, Acts of Violence and Terrorism, Disease Outbreak, Mention of Suicide, and General Mature Content.
